lgp.core.evolution

Class Problem<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>

  • lgp.core.evolution.Problem<TProgram,TOutput>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BaseProblem, FullAdderExperiment, IrisProblem, SimpleFunctionProblem, SimpleFunctionProblem, SinPolyProblem

    public class Problem<TProgram,TOutput extends Output<TProgram>>

    Defines a problem and the components that should be used to solve that problem.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Environment<TProgram,TOutput> environment
      An environment built up of the components this problem uses.
      EvolutionModel<TProgram,TOutput> model
      An evolutionary model that should be used to solve this problem.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      Defines a problem and the components that should be used to solve that problem.

    • Field Detail

      • environment

        public Environment<TProgram,TOutput> environment

        An environment built up of the components this problem uses.

        The environment should be initialised in the Problem.initialiseEnvironment method.

        See Also:
        Problem.initialiseEnvironment

      • model

        public EvolutionModel<TProgram,TOutput> model

        An evolutionary model that should be used to solve this problem.

        The model should be initialised in the Problem.initialiseModel method.

      • initialiseEnvironment

        public void initialiseEnvironment()

        Initialises the environment for this problem.

        NB: This method must be called before Problem.solve.

        See Also:
        Problem.solve

      • initialiseModel

        public void initialiseModel()

        Initialises the model for this problem.

        NB: This method must be called before Problem.solve.

        See Also:
        Problem.solve
